sources.name: DimRiskObject
sources.description: selecting distinct values from dim risk object

sources.name: DimRiskObject2
sources.description: selecting distinct values from dim risk object

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		rob_imono as string,
		rob_object_key as string,
		rob_date_end as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select rob_imono, rob_object_key, rob_date_end from marts.dim_risk_object',
	format: 'query') ~> DimRiskObject
source(output(
		rob_vessel_name as string,
		rob_object_key as string,
		rob_imono as string,
		rob_date_end as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select rob_vessel_name,\nrob_object_key,\nrob_imono,\nrob_date_end \nfrom marts.dim_risk_object',
	format: 'query') ~> DimRiskObject2
source(output(
		rob_date_start as date,
		rob_imono as string,
		rob_object_key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select rob_date_start, rob_imono, rob_object_key from marts.dim_risk_object',
	format: 'query') ~> MaxDimRiskObject
source(output(
		rob_imono as string,
		rob_object_key as string,
		rob_date_start as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select rob_imono, rob_object_key, rob_date_start from marts.dim_risk_object',
	format: 'query') ~> MaxDimRiskObject3
DimRiskObject2 derive(source_system = case(like(rob_object_key, 'G%'), 'GIC', 'PARIS')) ~> SourceSystem
SourceSystem derive(key = case(coalesce(rob_imono, '0')!='0', concat('I', rob_imono), rob_object_key),
		paris_key = case(source_system=='PARIS', rob_object_key, toString(null())),
		imono = case(coalesce(rob_imono,'0')!='0', rob_imono, toString(null())),
		vessel_name_paris = case(source_system=='PARIS', rob_vessel_name, toString(null()))) ~> Keys
MaxDimRiskObject, MaxDimRiskObject3 join(MaxDimRiskObject@rob_imono == MaxDimRiskObject3@rob_imono
	&& MaxDimRiskObject@rob_date_start == MaxDimRiskObject3@rob_date_start,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> maxmax
MaxDimRiskObject3 aggregate(groupBy(rob_object_key),
	rob_date_start = max(rob_date_start)) ~> maxdate
maxmax aggregate(groupBy(rob_imono = MaxDimRiskObject@rob_imono),
	rob_object_key = max(MaxDimRiskObject@rob_object_key)) ~> maxobjectkey
DimRiskObject, maxobjectkey lookup(DimRiskObject@rob_imono == maxobjectkey@rob_imono,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> lkpmaximono
lkpmaximono derive(object_key = case(like(DimRiskObject@rob_object_key, 'P%')&&DimRiskObject@rob_imono!='0', coalesce(maxobjectkey@rob_object_key,DimRiskObject@rob_object_key), DimRiskObject@rob_object_key)) ~> objectkey
objectkey derive(key = case(coalesce(maxobjectkey@rob_imono,'0')!='0', concat('I', DimRiskObject@rob_imono), DimRiskObject@rob_object_key)) ~> key
key aggregate(groupBy(key,
		object_key),
	rob_date_end = max(rob_date_end)) ~> maxenddate
maxenddate, Keys join(maxenddate@key == Keys@key
	&& object_key == rob_object_key
	&& maxenddate@rob_date_end == DimRiskObject2@rob_date_end,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joiner
joiner derive(Paris_date = case(like(rob_object_key,'P%'), maxenddate@rob_date_end,toDate(case(1!=1,1)))) ~> ParisDate
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(key),
	each(match(name!='key'), $$ = max($$))) ~> maxeverything
ParisDate select(mapColumn(
		key = maxenddate@key,
		rob_object_key = object_key,
		rob_date_end = maxenddate@rob_date_end,
		vessel_name = rob_vessel_name,
		rob_imono,
		paris_key,
		vessel_name_paris,
		Paris_date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
maxeverything derive(vessel_name = case(like(maxeverything@key,'I%'), case(isNull(Paris_date)==true(), vessel_name, vessel_name_paris), vessel_name),
		key = coalesce(maxeverything@key,'N/A')) ~> vesselname
vesselname select(mapColumn(
		ves_key = {maxeverything@key},
		vessel_name,
		ves_imono = rob_imono,
		ves_paris_key = paris_key,
		vessel_name_paris
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renaming
renaming alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> upsert
upsert sink(input(
		dimension_key as long,
		ves_vessel_name_me as string,
		ves_vessel_name as string,
		all_description as string,
		ves_imono as string,
		ves_gic_key as string,
		ves_vessel_name_pi as string,
		all_key as string,
		ves_key as string,
		ves_paris_key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ves_paris_key'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimCurrentVessel
